verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] annouce tariffs on steel and aluminum imports form the European Union as soon as Thursday , according to a new report . The tariffs come after negotiations between the EU and US failed to reach an alternative trade deal .

The tariffs come after negotiations between the EU and US failed to reach an alternative trade deal .
